Alpha Fastapi Core Plugins’s documentation!¶

Project help¶

This Project help you to build microservice with fastapi with these futures. You can use sample project to build your own services.

Important

This Project based on mongodb and rabbitmq , if you wanna use another database or message broker you can add like Plugins to this project.

Plugins¶

  • core package
    • core.aes package
    • core.exceptions package
    • core.i18n package
    • core.jwt package
    • core.middlewares package
    • core.mongo package
    • core.permissions package
    • core.proxies package
    • core.rabbit package
    • core.responses package
    • core.zipkin package
